start.description: Timestamp for the point in time when the candle was initially created/opened, in nanoseconds since the epoch - See [`VegaTimeResponse`](#api.VegaTimeResponse).`timestamp`

last_update.description: Timestamp for the point in time when the candle was last updated, in nanoseconds since the epoch - See [`VegaTimeResponse`](#api.VegaTimeResponse).`timestamp`

high.description: Highest price for trading during the candle interval

low.description: Lowest price for trading during the candle interval

volume.description: Total trading volume during the candle interval

datanode.api.v2.Candle.title: Candle
datanode.api.v2.Candle.description: Represents the high, low, open, and closing prices for an interval of trading, referred to commonly as a candlestick or candle
